about_the_game:
Don't want to grind? Get all [Earth Day 2021] decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
  • Ceiling Vines
  • Dark Wood Frame
  • Fiddle Tree Left
  • Fiddle Tree Right
  • Log Tables
  • Pancake Plant
  • Honeycomb
  • Blooming HedgeHog
  • Pandan Leaf Box

**PLEASE NOTE:
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
